objects.specification: A flat floor surface with a seamless natural leafy green textured finish, featuring a subtle matte appearance for a soft underfoot feel.
A smooth flat ceiling plane with a clean, matte white plaster finish, minimalistic design to reflect ambient light evenly.
A vertical structural wall with warm earth-tone beige plaster finish, smooth surface and crisp edges for a cozy classroom atmosphere.

A large teacher’s desk with a polished natural wood surface, sturdy tapered legs, smooth rounded edges, and subtle green accent drawer handles.
A single chair with a solid wood frame and green cushioned seat and back, ergonomic contours and matte finish.
A cylindrical trash bin in neutral gray plastic texture with a matte surface and simple rounded top edge.
A circular wall clock with a clean white face, black hour markers and slim black frame, in a minimalistic modern design.
A large rectangular overhead ceiling light fixture with a translucent white diffuser and a slim metallic frame, emitting bright even illumination.
